title: The cold client

replies.body: It sucks to get that [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty and I'd like to help!  I'm not sure if you got any specific error messages and unless you are using any third party programs, these cases can be caused by connection problems in champion select.  I suggest starting out with each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
